mapper.select: /* [OrdmadeNotfullyMapper.xml] selectOrdmadeNotfully */ SELECT OD.INVOICE_NO AS invoiceNo, OD.INVOICE_SEQ AS invoiceSeq, OD.WAREHOUSE_KEY AS warehouseKey, OD.GROUP_NO AS groupNo, OD.WORK_BATCH_NO AS workBatchNo, OD.PICKING_WAVE_NO AS pickingWaveNo, OD.SKU_CODE AS skuCode, OD.SKU_NAME AS skuName, OD.SKU_SUB_NAME AS skuSubName, OD.QTY_NOTFULLY AS qtyNotfully, OD.SHIP_ORDER_KEY AS shipOrderKey, OD.SHIP_ORDER_ITEM_SEQ AS shipOrderItemSeq, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS insertedDate, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS') AS insertedTime, OH.CREATED_USER AS insertedUser FROM o_wcs.TB_QPS_ORDER_HDR OH , o_wcs.TB_QPS_ORDER_DTL OD WHERE OH.INVOICE_NO = OD.INVOICE_NO AND OD.ORDMADE_NOTFULLY_TYPE IN ( 'ORDMADE', 'PARTSHIP' ) AND OD.NOTFULLY_IF_YN = 'N'
